articles.title: Stowaway found dead inside landing gear of an American Airlines flight - ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
Suspect held in waterfront bar shooting that left 3 dead in North Carolina - NPR
articles.description: The attack took place at the American Fish Company, a bar and live-music venue. Police are asking anyone who witnessed the shooting to contact them.
articles.content: Three people were killed and five wounded in Southport, N.C., on Saturday night when police say a gunman attacked a bar from the water, driving his boat up alongside an open-air dock-front bar and op… [+2117 chars]
